greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A112046(2n) - A112046(2n-1) = A112048(n) - A112047(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a112046[n_]:=Block[{i=1}, While[JacobiSymbol[i, 2n + 1]==1, i++]; i]; Table[a112046[2n] - a112046[2n - 1] , {n, 101}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, May 24 2017 *)
program: from sympy import jacobi_symbol as J
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 102)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 24 2017
xref: Indices where a(n) is not zero: A112054. Values at those points: A112059.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 27 2005
